channel.title: Need help with stability
channel.description: I'm just wondering why my server lag at 100 online, lag like stop and move, And It's Dedicated Server also 100 online = 1% CPU, using final devolution 2.7 source, yeah i don't understand problem anyone?

item.title: Need help with stability
item.dc:creator: @sabsabi sabsabi
item.description:
@sabsabi wrote:

fatwallet:

There are most likely nulls and hidden nulls that are taking up server memory. for every player, there could be 4 nulls, to in theory, you would have 500 players. 100 real and 400 fake

No, i dont have any null, or hidden null, and they are not takin server memory process was 1% 157 players. and 100% without null,

Read full topic
